name: starttls-frontend
description: Static front end for the STARTTLS scanner

scripts.js:install: mkdir -p static/vendor && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js static/vendor/ && cp node_modules/raven-js/dist/raven.js static/vendor/
scripts.js:build: yarn run js:install && babel js --out-file static/application.js
scripts.js:watch: yarn run js:install && babel js --watch --out-file static/application.js --source-maps
scripts.build: yarn run sass:build && yarn run js:build && hugo
scripts.serve: yarn run sass:build && parallelshell 'yarn run sass:watch' 'yarn run js:watch' 'hugo serve'

author: Electronic Frontier Foundation
